about.details:
Incorporated in June 2005, Avax Apparels And Ornaments Limited is involved in two separate lines of business:

  • Wholesale trading
  • Online retail of silver ornaments

The company wholesales knitted fabric and sells silver ornaments online, including rings, ladies' payal, gents kada, plate sets, glass, bangles, bowls, chains, and other jewellery. It supplies all major cities across the country.

The company has several key advantages in wholesale trading. It is geographically located in the hub of cloth manufacturing, which provides a significant advantage. In addition, the company benefits from the growing demand for these products and the strong business relationships maintained by the management, all of which contribute to the company's success in this segment.

Competitive Strengths

  • Locational advantage
  • Good network and connections with the players in the Sector
  • Excellent Customer Relations
  • Experienced and professional Team
  • Good Track record of the management

As of September 2024, the company has 7 full term employees.

faqs.question: What is the Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO?
faqs.answer:
Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO is a SME IPO of 274000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1.92 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹70 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on January 7, 2025, and closes on January 9, 2025.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO opens on January 7, 2025 and closes on January 9, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO?
faqs.answer: Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO will be done on Friday, January 10, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, January 13, 2025. Check the Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Avax Apparels And Ornaments IPO listing date is on Tuesday, January 14, 2025.
